Name: Coerced: Unexpected Detention
About the game: Get ready for a wild ride of discovery and unexpected twists in this short visual novel. Follow the protagonist, a college student, and his girlfriend as they find themselves detained after misbehaving during a lecture. You would think you cannot get detention in college, yet here you are. However, what starts as a seemingly simple and boring punishment quickly turns into a sexually charged and chaotic afternoon. As the day comes to a close, the protagonist uncovers shocking evidence that there is more going on than meets the eye. With thrilling and erotic action throughout, this visual novel will keep you hooked until the very end.
